item.title: Dark Bow -- Double hitting #2! READ BEFORE POST
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Hmm, k… This is whats above that…

else if(HasArrows){
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827) {
dbow = true;
dbow timer = 2;
createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 60, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);
createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 40, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);
//actionAmount++;
//setAnimation(playerSEA);
DeleteArrow();
createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, arrowgfx(), 43, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != 0)
ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, 1, playerId, false);
setAnimation(426);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
AttackingOn2.KillerId = playerId+10;
AttackingOn2.inCombat();
inCombat();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
AttackingOn2.setAnimation(GetBlockAnim(AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));
LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay
if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
hitDiff = EnemyHP;
}
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff].hitDiff = hitDiff;
//PkingDelay = wepdelay;
}

=P?

item.title: Dark Bow -- Double hitting #2! READ BEFORE POST
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Please learn about primitive data types before you post. You don’t have to assign a value when declaring them the default value is generally 0 or null. For booleans the default value is generally false.

item.title: Dark Bow -- Double hitting #2! READ BEFORE POST
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

This should work for you …

First declare these

public boolean dbow; public int dbowtimer;

And these in your attack method

int X = server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int Y = server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int offsetX = (absX - X) * -1; int offsetY = (absY - Y) * -1;

Then right under

if(HasArrows){

add

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827) { dbow = true; dbowtimer = 2; createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 60, 31, 0 - AttackingOn); createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 40, 31, 0 - AttackingOn); }

Then under your process add

[code]if(IsAttacking && dbow && dbowtimer == 0) {
setAnimation(426);
SpecDamgg(40);
dbow = false;
}

if (dbowtimer > 0)
dbowtimer -= 1;[/code]

Read full topic

Haha, i couldnt agree with you more
He we in the #moparscape IRC channel, and Fasga was saying something to him and zenzie said something like “I bet i have done more java than you”, everyone laughed at him and then he said to Fasga “ok then, what have you done”, Fasga showed Zenzie his bytecode lib, Zenzie replied with something like “Oh, nice, how long did that take you”, no one believed he even knew what bytecode was and everyone was asking him but he just ignored it.

I love how Zenzie thinks he is something he isnt.
